title: Sunil Garg - Main
tag-2: Sunil Garg is CEO of Citibank, N.A., which is Citi’s primary banking entity with branches and subsidiaries in 95 countries and territories. Citibank, N.A. accounts for 75 percent of Citigroup’s total assets. He is also Head of Citi’s North America activities, overseeing the United States and Canada markets. He is a member of Citi’s Executive Management Team.
tag-3: Sunil joined Citi in May 1988 as a Management Associate in India and has worked in India, Singapore, Malaysia and the United States during his tenure. He has worked in several roles across Citi, notably in Operations & Technology; Treasury & Trade Solutions; Corporate and Investment Banking; and Commercial Banking. Sunil was also a member of Citi’s Global Consumer Banking and the Institutional Client Group‘s management committees for several years during his tenure. Most recently, Sunil led the Commercial Bank from 2011 to 2021. Prior to that, he led the U.S. Commercial Banking business from 2008 until 2011.
tag-4: Sunil graduated with a major in economics from St. Stephen’s College, India, followed by the Post Graduate Program from Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad.
